title: Common Targets Threat Modeling
body:
### Background

It was decided to spin-off the MSBuild shipped tasks threat modeling from the MSBuild engine threat modeling: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/10214
As part of this item a MSBuild common targets threat model should be produced and security reviewed.

### Goals

* [ ] Create the doc ([initial skeleton](https://microsoft.sharepoint.com/:w:/t/ManagedLanguagesIDE/EX0mgFi9TGJEkAKi3JYd7_EBZxyaXX1-tIze9Hbi2megLw?e=fQTn7T))
* [ ] Schedule and run the security review with security team - https://threatmodelingportal.security.azure/create-schedule
